entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
